verbs.description: Spouses of H-1B visa workers , whose work permits [V: may] be revoked in June by the Trump administration , say they are being unfairly targeted and have a right to earn a living . So do we , say laid - off US tech workers , accusing companies of abusing the visa system to lock them out of jobs .
